allow: Bash(for func in renderNDAs openNDAModal closeNDAModal saveNDA editNDA deleteNDA showNDACtx hideNDACtx ndaCtxAction previewNDADirect dupNDA previewNDA saveClients renderClients openAddClient saveClient editClient delClient showClientPicker pickClient bumpVersion toggleCover buildCoverHtml)
